info.title: Parchment APIs
info.description: Parchments API documentation for partner integrations, enabling secure e-prescription services

post.description: Creates a new patient in Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

requestBody.description: Patient data to add to Parchment

error.title: Partner patient ID conflict
error.detail: Partner patient ID 'PARTNER#12345' is already in use by another patient. Please use a unique identifier.

error.title: Validation failed
error.detail: There were some problems with your input.

error.title: Bad request
error.detail: The request could not be processed due to invalid data.

post.description: Generate an access token for API authentication

parameters.name: x-partner-id
parameters.description: Partner ID for authentication - provided by Parchment

parameters.name: x-partner-secret
parameters.description: Partner secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-id
parameters.description: Organization ID for authentication - provided by Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

parameters.name: x-user-id
parameters.description: User ID for authentication - provided by Parchment

error.title: Validation failed
error.detail: There were some problems with your input.

get.description: Validate integration token and mark organization as integrated

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

200.description: Token validation successful and organization marked as integrated

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid token, missing credentials, or insufficient permissions

error.title: Internal Server Error
error.detail: An unexpected error occurred during validation

get.description: Get prescriptions for a specific patient

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

error.title: Patient not found
error.detail: Patient with the specified ID does not exist.

post.description: Creates a new user in Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

requestBody.description: User data to add to Parchment

409.description: Conflict - Partner user ID already exists

get.description: Retrieves all users in an organization from Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return (1-100)

parameters.name: lastKey
parameters.description: Pagination key for retrieving the next set of results

get.description: Retrieves a specific user from Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

requestBody.description: User data to update in Parchment

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

put.description: Updates the roles of a user in Parchment

parameters.name: x-organization-secret
parameters.description: Organization secret for authentication - provided by Parchment

requestBody.description: User roles data to update in Parchment

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

count.description: Number of items in current response

lastKey.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page. Use this value as the lastKey query parameter for the next request. If null, no more pages are available

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

detail.example: There were some problems with your input.

instance.description: URI reference to the specific occurrence

date_of_birth.description: Patient's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

phone.description: Patient's Australian phone number (optional). Must be a valid Australian number with digits only. Supports mobile (04xxxxxxxx) and landline (0[2378]xxxxxxxx) formats. International format with +61 or 61 prefix is also accepted.

partner_patient_id.description: Partner's unique identifier for the patient

partner_id.description: Partner's unique identifier for the organization

external_patient_id.description: Partner's unique identifier for the patient

parchment_patient_id.description: Parchment's unique identifier for the patient

url.description: URL to access the patient in Parchment portal

date_of_birth.description: User's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format (required if role includes 'provider')

phone.description: User's Australian phone number. Must be a valid Australian number with digits only. Supports mobile (04xxxxxxxx) and landline (0[2378]xxxxxxxx) formats. International format with +61 or 61 prefix is also accepted.

access_roles.description: List of access roles for the user

hpii_number.description: Healthcare Provider Individual Identifier (required if role includes 'provider')

prescriber_number.description: Prescriber number (required if role includes 'provider' and prescriber_type is not 'T')

partner_user_id.description: Partner's unique identifier for the user

external_user_id.description: Partner's unique identifier for the user

parchment_user_id.description: Parchment's unique identifier for the user

url.description: Direct link to user in Parchment portal

access_roles.description: Array of roles to assign to the user

items.description: Valid user roles. Note: owner, support, and member roles cannot be assigned via API.

user_id.description: Parchment's unique identifier for the user

access_roles.description: Updated array of roles assigned to user

grantType.description: Type of grant for OAuth2 authentication

scope.description: List of permission scopes being requested
